entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
